import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import{motion}from'framer-motion';import{Brain,TrendingUp,Calendar}from'lucide-react';import{useAuth}from'../../contexts/AuthContext';import{buildApiUrl}from'../../config';import axios from'axios';import Card from'../ui/Card';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const MindfulnessScore=()=>{const{token}=useAuth();const[mindfulnessData,setMindfulnessData]=useState({todayScore:0,weeklyAverage:0,recentCheckins:[],trends:{},yearData:[]});const[loading,setLoading]=useState(true);const[showYearView,setShowYearView]=useState(false);useEffect(()=>{fetchMindfulnessData();},[]);const fetchMindfulnessData=async()=>{try{setLoading(true);const today=new Date().toISOString().split('T')[0];const weekAgo=new Date(Date.now()-7*24*60*60*1000).toISOString().split('T')[0];const yearAgo=new Date(Date.now()-365*24*60*60*1000).toISOString().split('T')[0];// Fetch weekly data

const generateYearGrid=checkins=>{const today=new Date();const yearStart=new Date(today.getFullYear(),0,1);const yearEnd=new Date(today.getFullYear(),11,31);// Create a map of check-ins by date
